title: Authors and Citation
text: EUROCONTROL Performance Review Unit (PRU). Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: (PRU) E (2025). pbwg.eurocontrol: PBWG Wrappers EUROCONTROL Data. R package version 0.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pbwg.eurocontrol: PBWG Wrappers for EUROCONTROL Data},   author = {EUROCONTROL Performance Review Unit (PRU)},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1}, }

title: PBWG Wrappers for EUROCONTROL Data
text: High-level R helpers PBWG workflows EUROCONTROL. package wraps eurocontrol primitives purpose-built SQL pull NM area traffic, DAIO, APDF airport data, punctuality extracts, combined CHN-EUR summaries. Note: package expects connectivity PRU Oracle schemas (PRU_DEV/PRU_ATMAP) ROracle client; available CRAN.

title: PBWG Wrappers for EUROCONTROL Data
PBWG Wrappers for EUROCONTROL Data
text: pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts() - NM area traffic split wake turbulence aircraft category. pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts() - NM area traffic market segment. pbwg_daio() - Daily DAIO counts region. pbwg_traffic_summary() / pbwg_chn_summary() - Composite daily tables used PBWG outputs. pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw() / pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements() - APDF airport extracts daily summaries. pbwg_otp_punctuality() - Punctuality extracts selected airports/years.

title: PBWG Wrappers for EUROCONTROL Data
text: function accepts optional conn (DBI connection). omitted, fresh Oracle connection created via eurocontrol::db_connection(); ensure environment provides required credentials Oracle client.
code: library(pbwg.eurocontrol)  # NM area by wake turbulence category wtc <- pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts(wef = "2024-01-01", til = "2024-01-31")  # DAIO daily counts and composite PBWG summary daio <- pbwg_daio("2024-01-01", "2024-01-31", region = "ECAC") summary <- pbwg_traffic_summary("2024-01-01", "2024-01-31")  # APDF airport movements for a set of ICAO codes apdf <- pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements(   airports = c("EBBR", "EIDW"),   wef = "2024-01-01",   til = "2024-01-07" )

what: Fetch CHN-EUR datasets to Parquet — fetch_chn_eur_datasets
title: Fetch CHN-EUR datasets to Parquet — fetch_chn_eur_datasets
text: Downloads NM area traffic counts (weight market segments), regional roll-ups, APDF airport traffic counts, OTP punctuality buckets date window, writing dataset Parquet files downstream CHN-EUR reporting.

title: Fetch CHN-EUR datasets to Parquet — fetch_chn_eur_datasets
code: fetch_chn_eur_datasets(   wef = as.Date("2019-01-01"),   til = as.Date("2025-06-30"),   airports = c("EDDF", "EDDM", "EGKK", "EGLL", "EHAM", "LEBL", "LEMD", "LFPG", "LGAV",     "LIRF", "LSZH", "LTFM"),   years = NULL,   include_weight = TRUE,   include_market = TRUE,   include_regional = TRUE,   include_airport = TRUE,   include_raw_apdf = TRUE,   include_otp = TRUE,   out_dir = "data/eur" )

title: Fetch CHN-EUR datasets to Parquet — fetch_chn_eur_datasets
text: wef Date; start interval (inclusive). til Date; end interval (inclusive). airports Character vector ICAO airport codes include APDF OTP datasets. years Optional integer vector years OTP. Defaults years overlapping [wef, til]. include_weight Logical; fetch NM area weight segment counts. include_market Logical; fetch NM area market segment counts. include_regional Logical; fetch regional roll-(PBWG schema). include_airport Logical; fetch APDF airport traffic counts. include_raw_apdf Logical; also export raw APDF rows available. include_otp Logical; fetch OTP punctuality buckets. out_dir Output directory; created missing.

title: Fetch CHN-EUR datasets to Parquet — fetch_chn_eur_datasets
text: Invisibly returns TRUE writing requested datasets.

title: PBWG EUROCONTROL helper package — pbwg.eurocontrol-package
text: Provides high-level wrappers combining eurocontrol primitives purpose-built SQL PBWG ECTL workflows.

title: PBWG EUROCONTROL helper package — pbwg.eurocontrol-package
text: pbwg_traffic_summary()Regional EUR traffic roll-combining DAIO, wake turbulence, market segment counts diagnostics. pbwg_chn_summary()Lean variant traffic summary aligned CHN-EUR dashboard schema. pbwg_daio()Daily DAIO breakdowns region, optional SK_SOURCE_ID. pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts()Network Manager area traffic wake turbulence category (NM flights fact + aircraft categories). pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts()Network Manager area traffic market segment (NM flights fact + flight type rule dimension). pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw()Raw APDF rows single airport date range, retaining operational fields used PBWG tools. pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements()Daily APDF airport movements arrivals/departures, H/M/L split, domestic flags. pbwg_otp_punctuality()CODA/CFMU punctuality summary selected airports years. fetch_chn_eur_datasets()One-call exporter pulls NM counts, regional roll-ups, APDF airport summaries, OTP buckets Parquet.

title: PBWG EUROCONTROL helper package — pbwg.eurocontrol-package
text: Maintainer: EUROCONTROL Performance Review Unit (PRU) pru-support@eurocontrol.int

what: Columns used for APDF extracts — pbwg_apdf_columns_default
title: Columns used for APDF extracts — pbwg_apdf_columns_default
text: Returns default column set used PBWG APDF queries. fields carry identifiers, movement times wake turbulence class needed legacy airport-level summaries.

title: Columns used for APDF extracts — pbwg_apdf_columns_default
Columns used for APDF extracts — pbwg_apdf_columns_default
text: Character vector APDF column names.

title: Daily APDF airport summary — pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements
text: Rebuilds parquet-export workflow PBWG tooling: pulls APDF movements per airport, coerces registrations/types PBWG shape, aggregates daily arrivals/departures heavy/medium/light split. Date ranges spanning multiple years handled yearly chunks keep queries manageable.

title: Daily APDF airport summary — pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements
code: pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements(   airports,   wef,   til,   conn = NULL,   domestic_prefixes = pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default() )

title: Daily APDF airport summary — pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements
text: airports Character vector ICAO airport codes. wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY. domestic_prefixes Character prefixes used flag domestic traffic via pbwg_apdf_is_domestic(). Defaults ECTL set defined pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default().

title: Daily APDF airport summary — pbwg_apdf_daily_airport_movements
text: Tibble one row per airport per day containing: ICAOAirport code. DATEMovement date (UTC). ARRSArrival count. DEPSDeparture count. HEAVYHeavy wake turbulence movements. MEDMedium wake turbulence movements. LIGHTLight wake turbulence movements. ARRS_DOMDomestic arrivals matched ICAO prefixes. DEPS_DOMDomestic departures matched ICAO prefixes.

what: Summarise APDF movements for one airport/day — pbwg_apdf_daily_summarise
title: Summarise APDF movements for one airport/day — pbwg_apdf_daily_summarise
text: Internal helper normalises column names wake-turbulence classes, flags domestic traffic, drops helicopters, aggregates arrivals/departures plus H/M/L totals.

title: Summarise APDF movements for one airport/day — pbwg_apdf_daily_summarise
Summarise APDF movements for one airport/day — pbwg_apdf_daily_summarise
text: raw_tbl Output pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw() equivalent APDF data frame. airport ICAO airport code used flag arrivals vs departures. domestic_prefixes Prefixes passed pbwg_apdf_is_domestic().

title: Summarise APDF movements for one airport/day — pbwg_apdf_daily_summarise
text: Tibble one row per day provided airport, containing: ICAOAirport code. DATEMovement date (UTC). ARRSArrival count. DEPSDeparture count. HEAVYHeavy wake turbulence movements. MEDMedium wake turbulence movements. LIGHTLight wake turbulence movements. ARRS_DOMDomestic arrivals based prefixes. DEPS_DOMDomestic departures based prefixes.

what: ICAO prefixes treated as domestic — pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default
title: ICAO prefixes treated as domestic — pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default
text: Helper list ICAO country/region prefixes define "domestic" APDF traffic PBWG reporting.

title: ICAO prefixes treated as domestic — pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default
ICAO prefixes treated as domestic — pbwg_apdf_domestic_prefixes_default
text: Character vector prefixes (upper-case).

what: Fetch APDF records for a single airport — pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw
title: Fetch APDF records for a single airport — pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw
text: Queries SWH_FCT.FAC_APDS_FLIGHT_IR691 via eurocontrol::apdf_tbl(), filters one airport date window, collects rows. default column set keeps operational details (AC_CLASS, runway/stand, movement times) dropped eurocontrol::apdf_tidy().

title: Fetch APDF records for a single airport — pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw
code: pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw(   airport,   wef,   til,   columns = pbwg_apdf_columns_default(),   conn = NULL )

title: Fetch APDF records for a single airport — pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw
text: airport ICAO airport designator (e.g. "EIDW"). single code allowed. wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. columns Vector column names include. Defaults exact set used Python scripts; see pbwg_apdf_columns_default() details. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

title: Fetch APDF records for a single airport — pbwg_apdf_fetch_airport_raw
text: tibble::tibble() requested APDF columns attached "sql" attribute describing filter. Columns (default set): AP_C_FLTIDFlight identifier (source airport). AP_C_FLTRULRules flight operates (IFR, VFR, NA). AP_C_REGAircraft registration separators removed. ADEP_ICAODeparture aerodrome (ICAO). ADES_ICAODestination aerodrome (ICAO). SRC_PHASEDEP departures, ARR arrivals. MVT_TIME_UTCMovement time (UTC). BLOCK_TIME_UTCBlock time (UTC). SCHED_TIME_UTCScheduled time (UTC). ARCTYPICAO aircraft type code (e.g. A21N). AC_CLASSWake turbulence class (kept H/M/L aggregation). AP_C_RWYRunway identifier. AP_C_STNDStand identifier. C40_CROSS_TIMETime first/last 40 NM crossing. C40_CROSS_LATLatitude 40 NM crossing. C40_CROSS_LONLongitude 40 NM crossing. C100_CROSS_TIMETime first/last 100 NM crossing. C100_CROSS_LATLatitude 100 NM crossing. C100_CROSS_LONLongitude 100 NM crossing. C40_BEARINGBearing 40 NM crossing. C100_BEARINGBearing 100 NM crossing.

title: Detect domestic APDF traffic — pbwg_apdf_is_domestic
text: Flags ICAO codes start provided prefixes. Used APDF summaries derive domestic arrival/departure counts.

title: Detect domestic APDF traffic — pbwg_apdf_is_domestic
Detect domestic APDF traffic — pbwg_apdf_is_domestic
text: code ICAO code vector. prefixes Vector prefixes match (upper-case).

title: Detect domestic APDF traffic — pbwg_apdf_is_domestic
text: Logical vector: TRUE code matches one prefixes.

what: Split a date range into yearly APDF chunks — pbwg_apdf_split_yearly_ranges
title: Split a date range into yearly APDF chunks — pbwg_apdf_split_yearly_ranges
text: Breaks [wef, til] span one list element per calendar year, allowing multi-year APDF summaries queried manageable blocks.

title: Split a date range into yearly APDF chunks — pbwg_apdf_split_yearly_ranges
Split a date range into yearly APDF chunks — pbwg_apdf_split_yearly_ranges
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands.

title: Split a date range into yearly APDF chunks — pbwg_apdf_split_yearly_ranges
text: List lists wef til date entries year.

title: CHN-EUR collaboration traffic summary — pbwg_chn_summary
text: Thin wrapper around pbwg_traffic_summary() returning CHN-EUR schema (schema = "chn").

title: CHN-EUR collaboration traffic summary — pbwg_chn_summary
CHN-EUR collaboration traffic summary — pbwg_chn_summary
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. region DAIO region code. Defaults "ECAC". conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

what: Compile DAIO, weight, and market components — pbwg_compile_components
title: Compile DAIO, weight, and market components — pbwg_compile_components
text: Internal helper normalises component tables, aligns dates, produces share data diagnostics.

title: Compile DAIO, weight, and market components — pbwg_compile_components
Compile DAIO, weight, and market components — pbwg_compile_components
text: weight Tibble weight category counts columns including ENTRY_DATE, WK_TBL_CAT, CATEGORY1, FLIGHT. market Tibble market segment counts columns including ENTRY_DATE, MARKET_SEGMENT_DESCR, FLIGHT. daio Tibble DAIO counts columns including ENTRY_DATE, DAIO, FLIGHT.

title: Compile DAIO, weight, and market components — pbwg_compile_components
text: list : share Tibble columns DATE, FLIGHTS, D, , , O, HEAVY, MED, LIGHT, SCHED, CHARTER, CARGO, . delta Output pbwg_check_numbers() adding DAIO, D_DAIO, HML, D_HML, MARK, D_MARK share columns. messages Character vector diagnostic messages pbwg_check_messages(). plot Optional plotly object showing DAIO breakdown, otherwise NULL.

title: Daily DAIO traffic counts — pbwg_daio
text: Runs DAIO aggregation used PBWG, grouping FIR-time entries DAIO flag region. Optional inclusion SK_SOURCE_ID reproduces CHN-specific variant legacy Python query.

title: Daily DAIO traffic counts — pbwg_daio
code: pbwg_daio(wef, til, region, include_source_id = FALSE, conn = NULL)

title: Daily DAIO traffic counts — pbwg_daio
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. region One TZ codes (e.g. "ECAC"). Values embedded SQL (...) clause verbatim. include_source_id SK_SOURCE_ID returned? Defaults FALSE, mirroring classic DAIO table. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

title: Daily DAIO traffic counts — pbwg_daio
text: tibble::tibble() "sql" attribute columns: YEARNumeric year derived ENTRY_TIME. MONTHNumeric month derived ENTRY_TIME. ENTRY_DATEDate (UTC) FIR entry. TZ_NAMERegion name DIMCL_TZ. DAIODAIO flag (D, , , O). SK_SOURCE_IDOptional source ID include_source_id = TRUE. FLIGHTTotal flights grouping.

what: Distribute H/M/L delta back into categories — pbwg_fix_hml_delta
title: Distribute H/M/L delta back into categories — pbwg_fix_hml_delta
text: Adjusts Heavy/Medium/Light counts sum observed total flights, allocating discrepancy using fixed proportions.

title: Distribute H/M/L delta back into categories — pbwg_fix_hml_delta
Distribute H/M/L delta back into categories — pbwg_fix_hml_delta
text: df Tibble daily H/M/L totals FLIGHTS, containing columns ENTRY_DATE, H, M, L, FLIGHTS, N_HML, CHECK_N.

title: Distribute H/M/L delta back into categories — pbwg_fix_hml_delta
text: Tibble input columns plus: H2Adjusted heavy movements. M2Adjusted medium movements. L2Adjusted light movements. CHECK_N2Adjusted total H/M/L sum. DELTARemaining gap FLIGHTS adjustment.

what: NM area traffic by market segment — pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts
title: NM area traffic by market segment — pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts
text: Counts Network Manager area flights per day market segment, filtering flights fact operational statuses (TE, TA, AA) requested date window. Segments resolved SWH_FCT.DIM_FLIGHT_TYPE_RULE, missing day/segment combinations backfilled zeros give complete calendar grid.

title: NM area traffic by market segment — pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts
NM area traffic by market segment — pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

title: NM area traffic by market segment — pbwg_market_segment_tfc_counts
text: tibble::tibble() one row per day/market segment attached "sql" attribute. Columns: YEAR: numeric year extracted ENTRY_DATE. MONTH: numeric month extracted ENTRY_DATE. ENTRY_DATE: truncated IFPZ entry date (UTC). MARKET_SEGMENT: market segment label DIM_FLIGHT_TYPE_RULE. MARKET_SEGMENT_DESCR: description DIM_FLIGHT_TYPE_RULE. UNIT_CODE: fixed "NM_AREA". UNIT_NAME: fixed "Total Network Manager Area". FLIGHT: count flights date/segment combination.

title: OTP punctuality extract — pbwg_otp_punctuality
text: Pulls CODA/CFMU punctuality counts set airports years using dbplyr translation legacy SQL embedded 02-chn-eur-data-prep.Rmd. Flights bucketed departure/arrival delay (<=15 minutes vs >15) grouped month airport pairing TOP34 flags.

title: OTP punctuality extract — pbwg_otp_punctuality
OTP punctuality extract — pbwg_otp_punctuality
text: years Integer vector years (Gregorian) retrieve. airports Character vector ICAO airport designators used TOP34 flag well explicit airport columns result. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh PRU_DEV connection created via eurocontrol::db_connection().

title: OTP punctuality extract — pbwg_otp_punctuality
text: tibble attached "sql" attribute (named vector one SQL string per requested year) columns: YYYear truncated date (first day year). MMMonth truncated date (first day month). ADEPDeparture airport code; non-target airports grouped "OTH". ADESDestination airport code; non-target airports grouped "OTH". FROM_TOP34"Y"/"N" flag departure airport target set. TO_TOP34"Y"/"N" flag destination airport target set. TOP34"Y" either leg target set, otherwise "N". PCT_DEPDeparture punctuality bucket (<=15 >15). PCT_ARRArrival punctuality bucket (<=15 >15). N_CODANumber CODA records bucket. N_CFMUNumber CFMU records bucket. YEARNumeric year indicator matching query year.

title: Prepare H/M/L counts — pbwg_prepare_hml
text: Aggregates raw weight category counts Heavy/Medium/Light totals, reconciles overall flight counts, returns daily H/M/L.

title: Prepare H/M/L counts — pbwg_prepare_hml
Prepare H/M/L counts — pbwg_prepare_hml
text: weight Tibble weight category counts least ENTRY_DATE, WK_TBL_CAT, CATEGORY1, FLIGHT. flt Tibble overall flights per day, containing ENTRY_DATE FLIGHTS.

title: Prepare H/M/L counts — pbwg_prepare_hml
text: Tibble columns: ENTRY_DATEDate operation. HEAVYHeavy aircraft movements. MEDMedium aircraft movements. LIGHTLight aircraft movements.

title: Prepare market segment counts — pbwg_prepare_segments
text: Converts raw market segment counts PBWG segment groupings ensures required columns exist.

title: Prepare market segment counts — pbwg_prepare_segments
Prepare market segment counts — pbwg_prepare_segments
text: market Tibble ENTRY_DATE, MARKET_SEGMENT_DESCR, FLIGHT.

title: Prepare market segment counts — pbwg_prepare_segments
text: Tibble columns: ENTRY_DATEDate operation. SCHEDScheduled flights (mainline + low-cost + regional aircraft). CHARTERCharter flights. CARGOAll-cargo flights. OTHERBusiness aviation, military, types.

what: PBWG regional traffic summary (EUR view) — pbwg_traffic_summary
title: PBWG regional traffic summary (EUR view) — pbwg_traffic_summary
text: PBWG workflow merges DAIO, H/M/L, market segment statistics single daily table.

title: PBWG regional traffic summary (EUR view) — pbwg_traffic_summary
code: pbwg_traffic_summary(   wef,   til,   region = "ECAC",   schema = c("pbwg", "chn"),   conn = NULL )

title: PBWG regional traffic summary (EUR view) — pbwg_traffic_summary
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. region DAIO region code. Defaults "ECAC". schema Output shape: "pbwg" (default, full EUR table ARRS/DEPS, domestic, overflights, PAX) "chn" (lean CHN-EUR dashboard schema). conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

title: PBWG regional traffic summary (EUR view) — pbwg_traffic_summary
text: list processed data, optional plot (plotly installed), diagnostic details, raw component tables. data Tibble daily metrics. schema = "pbwg" columns REG, DATE, FLIGHTS, ARRS, DEPS, HEAVY, MED, LIGHT, ARRS_DOM, DEPS_DOM, OVR_FLTS, PAX, CARGO, , D, , , O, SCHED, CHARTER. schema = "chn" columns REG, DATE, FLIGHTS, D, , , O, HEAVY, MED, LIGHT, SCHED, CHARTER, CARGO, . plot Optional plotly object showing DAIO breakdown plotly installed, otherwise NULL. diagnostics List deltas (sanity-check calculations) messages (warnings imbalances). raw List component tables: weight_segment, market_segment, daio.

what: NM area traffic by wake turbulence category — pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts
title: NM area traffic by wake turbulence category — pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts
text: Counts Network Manager area flights per day wake turbulence category, filtering operational statuses (TE, TA, AA) requested date window. Uses eurocontrol::flights_tbl() base joins aircraft categories PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY (limited PBWG-allowed categories) aggregating.

title: NM area traffic by wake turbulence category — pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts
NM area traffic by wake turbulence category — pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts
text: wef Start date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. til End date (inclusive). Can anything lubridate::as_date() understands. conn Optional Oracle DBI::DBIConnection. omitted fresh connection PRUDEV created via eurocontrol::db_connection(), access SWH_FCT.V_FAC_FLIGHT_MS PRUDEV.V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY.

title: NM area traffic by wake turbulence category — pbwg_weight_segment_tfc_counts
text: tibble::tibble() one row per day/category combination attached "sql" attribute. Columns: ENTRY_DATE: truncated IFPZ entry date (UTC). MONTH: numeric month extracted ENTRY_DATE. YEAR: numeric year extracted ENTRY_DATE. WK_TBL_CAT: wake turbulence category (L/M/H/J/UNK). CATEGORY1: aircraft category level 1 V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY. CATEGORY2: aircraft category level 2 V_PRU_AIRCRAFT_CATEGORY. FLIGHT: count flights date/category combination. UNIT_CODE: fixed "NM_AREA". UNIT_NAME: fixed "Total Network Manager Area".
